db:info.db:title: WlShellSurface QML Type
db:info.db:edition: Qt Wayland Compositor | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Provides a wl_shell_surface that offers desktop-style compositor-specific features to a surface.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type is part of the WlShell extension and provides a way to extend the functionality of an existing WaylandSurface with features specific to desktop-style compositors, such as resizing and moving the surface.
It corresponds to the Wayland interface wl_shell_surface.

db:section.db:title: className : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the class name of the WlShellSurface.

db:section.db:title: shell : WlShell
db:section.db:para: This property holds the shell associated with this WlShellSurface.

db:section.db:title: surface : WaylandSurface
db:section.db:para: This property holds the wl_surface associated with this WlShellSurface.

db:section.db:title: title : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the title of the WlShellSurface.

db:section.db:title: windowType : enum
db:section.db:para: This property holds the window type of the WlShellSurface.

db:section.db:title: void initialize(WlShell shell, WaylandSurface surface, WaylandResource resource)
db:section.db:para: Initializes the WlShellSurface and associates it with the given shell, surface, and resource.

db:section.db:title: void ping()
db:section.db:para: Sends a ping event to the client. If the client replies to the event the pong signal will be emitted.

db:section.db:title: void sendConfigure(size s, enum edges)
db:section.db:para: Sends a configure event to the client, suggesting that it resize its surface to the provided size s. The edges provide a hint about how the surface was resized.

db:section.db:title: void sendPopupDone()
db:section.db:para: Sends a popup_done event to the client to indicate that the user has clicked somewhere outside the client's surfaces.
